Articles.Content: The Heavy Lifter's Crew (HLC) is a place where you can upload heavy lift rockets that you made. In order for it to be a heavy lifter, it must be able to carry at least 50 tons into LKO. Different ranks will be established. There are 5 different ranks, that will rank rockets based on how much weight it can carry, and how far it can carry the weight. The first rank is given to rockets that can put 50 tons into LKO. The second one is given to Rockets that can put 20 tons into HKO, in orbit of the mun, and Minmus. The Middle rank (bronze) is given to rockets that can get at least 20 tons into interplanetary space. The runner up rank (Silver) is given to rockets that can put 10 tons into Moho, Eve, Duna, or Dres. The Final Rank (gold) is given to rockets that can put 50 tons into Jool, Jool's Moons, and Eeloo. Also, it must be used with one launch.
